title: Digital Storytelling-Based Course for Enhancing Scientific Creative Thinking Skills for [Large-Scale] Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and digital tool application experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening scientific creative thinking competencies for solving social problems, targeting learners in managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners can transform scientific concepts into three or more visual representations using digital storytelling.
Learners can analyze complex social issues using scientific approaches and generate five or more alternative ideas.
Learners can complete collaborative storytelling projects using digital tools and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
